concept.title: Kafka Consumer
concept.shortdesc: The Kafka Consumer reads data from a Kafka cluster and processes the data based on the type of data stored in Kafka. You can use the Kafka Consumer to read log, JSON, and CSV data from a Kafka cluster.

conbody.p: When you configure a Kafka Consumer, you configure the consumer group name, topic, and ZooKeeper connection information. You can optionally configure custom properties to add additional Kafka configuration properties.
When you start a pipeline, the Kafka Consumer becomes a new consumer group for the topic and starts reading data from the topic based on the offset provided by the ZooKeeper.
The Kafka Consumer processes data from all partitions in the topic. It saves the offset with the ZooKeeper after passing data to destinations.
